original: @31b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @31b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ka l'a pa la ghu britti shi shya he ta n'a ma /
analyzed: ka l'a pa la ghu britti shi shya he ta n'a ma /
translated: Kalapalaghubriti-sisyaheta-nama.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: ka l'a pa'i 'grel pa nyung du las slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: ka l'a pa'i 'grel pa nyung du las slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba /
translated: Kalapalaghubriti-sisyaheta-nama.

original: smra ba'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: smra ba'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of Speech.

original: de nas pa ra smee'i tshig rnams brjod par bya'o //🔽aa tha par smee pa d'a ni //
analyzed: de nas pa ra smee'i tshig rnams brjod par bya'o // aa tha par smee pa d'a ni //
translated: Now the words of Parameshvara should be stated.🔽Atha parameshvarapadam.

original: a tha zhes bya ba ni bkra shis pa'i don to //
analyzed: a tha zhes bya ba ni bkra shis pa'i don to //
translated: Atha means auspicious.

original: gzhan gyi tshig rnams bshad de zhes bya ba ni dbang du byas pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshig rnams bshad de zhes bya ba ni dbang du byas pa ste /
translated: Explaining the words of others means brought under control.

original: 'di rnams ni snga ma dgu'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni snga ma dgu'o //
translated: These are the previous nine.

original: de la brta m'a na ni /
analyzed: de la brta m'a na ni /
translated: Among them, varttamanam.

original: 'di rnams te /
analyzed: 'di rnams te /
translated: These are.

original: ti ; tas\/ aanti /
analyzed: ti ; tas\/ aanti /
translated: Ti, tas/anti.

original: si / thas /
analyzed: si / thas /
translated: Si, tha.

original: tha / mi /
analyzed: tha / mi /
translated: Tha, mi.

original: was / mas /
analyzed: was / mas /
translated: Vasa, ma.

original: ai ti / na ba p'a r'a nyatma ne /
analyzed: ai ti / na ba p'a r'a nyatma ne /
translated: Iti, navaparanatamanam.

original: phyi ma'i rkyen dgu ni bdag gi tshig rnams te /
analyzed: phyi ma'i rkyen dgu ni bdag gi tshig rnams te /
translated: The nine future conditions are my own words.

original: 'di yang dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: This is also brought under control.

original: grangs ni 'di rnams so //
analyzed: grangs ni 'di rnams so //
translated: The number is these.

original: te / a'a te /
analyzed: te / a'a te /
translated: Te, at.

original: aante / se /🔽aa the / dhve /
analyzed: aante / se / aa the / dhve /
translated: Ante, se.🔽 Atha, dheva.

original: ae / ba he /
analyzed: ae / ba he /
translated: Ae, vahe.🔽

original: ma he / ai ti zhes bya ba 'di ltar byed pa'i tshig @32a * //
analyzed: ma he / ai ti zhes bya ba 'di ltar byed pa'i tshig @32a * //
translated: Mahī, iti—this is the word for “thus.”

original: thams cad khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: All [words] should be understood.

original: tri n'i tri n'i pra tha ma ma dhy'a motta m'a /
analyzed: tri n'i tri n'i pra tha ma ma dhy'a motta m'a /
translated: Trinī trinī prathamamadhyamottamam.

original: gzhan gyi tshig rnams dang bdag gi tshig can rnams gang yin pa gsum gsum gyi tshig de rnams ni dang po'i skyes bu dang / skyes bu bar ma dang / skyes bu mchog ces ba'i ming du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshig rnams dang bdag gi tshig can rnams gang yin pa gsum gsum gyi tshig de rnams ni dang po'i skyes bu dang / skyes bu bar ma dang / skyes bu mchog ces ba'i ming du 'gyur ro //
translated: The words of others and of oneself, which are threefold, become the names of the first person, the middle person, and the best person.

original: de dag ni 'di rnams te /
analyzed: de dag ni 'di rnams te /
translated: They are these:

original: ti / tas /
analyzed: ti / tas /
translated: ti, ti,

original: aanti zhes bya ba ni dang po'i skyes bu'o //
analyzed: aanti zhes bya ba ni dang po'i skyes bu'o //
translated: anti—this is the first person.

original: si / thas /
analyzed: si / thas /
translated: si, si,

original: tha zhes bya ba ni skyes bu bar ma'o //
analyzed: tha zhes bya ba ni skyes bu bar ma'o //
translated: tha—this is the middle person.

original: mi / bas /
analyzed: mi / bas /
translated: mi, mi,

original: mas zhes bya ba ni skyes bu mchog go //
analyzed: mas zhes bya ba ni skyes bu mchog go //
translated: mas—this is the best person.

original: de bzhin du bdag gi tshig can rnams la yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gi tshig can rnams la yang sbyar ro //
translated: In the same way, [the words] with the word for “oneself” should be applied.

original: 'di ltar byed pa'i tshig thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar byed pa'i tshig thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, all words for “doing” should be applied.

original: yugpa dhva tsa ne pa ra: pu ru sh'a n'a ma /
analyzed: yugpa dhva tsa ne pa ra: pu ru sh'a n'a ma /
translated: Yugapad dhavataḥ puruṣānām,

original: dang po dang bar ma dang / skyes bu mchog rnams kyi ming gang du dus mtshungs par 'thob par gyur na de la pha rol tad la si sbyar bas tyada'i mdos das aa thob /
analyzed: dang po dang bar ma dang / skyes bu mchog rnams kyi ming gang du dus mtshungs par 'thob par gyur na de la pha rol tad la si sbyar bas tyada'i mdos das aa thob /
translated: When the name of the first, the middle, and the best of men is obtained at the same time, then by adding the suffix tasi, the name is obtained in the dative case.

original: tas sa thob /🔽aushmad\ la si sbyar ba tvam ts'a /
analyzed: tas sa thob / aushmad\ la si sbyar ba tvam ts'a /
translated: By ta, it is obtained in the ablative case.🔽By adding the suffix oṣ, it is tvaṃ ca.

original: aa smad\ la si sbyar bas hvam ts'a /
analyzed: aa smad\ la si sbyar bas hvam ts'a /
translated: By adding the suffix as, it is haṃ ca.

original: pa tsa la skyes bu mchog gi mang po'i tshig mas sbyar /🔽bar du aan sbyar /
analyzed: pa tsa la skyes bu mchog gi mang po'i tshig mas sbyar / bar du aan sbyar /
translated: In pacati, the word for the best of men is connected with the middle.🔽In the middle, an is connected.

original: na phyi / aa dang ts sbyar //
analyzed: na phyi / aa dang ts sbyar //
translated: Na is connected with ca.

original: aa sya wa mo d'irgas tsa bsrings pa'o //
analyzed: aa sya wa mo d'irgas tsa bsrings pa'o //
translated: Asya vā modaigacetas ca is lengthened.

original: gnyis pa las kyang pha rol gyi dbang yin par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gnyis pa las kyang pha rol gyi dbang yin par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: In the second, it becomes the power of the other.

original: de dang po'i tshig dang / bar pa'i tshig gnyis las bar mas thob ste /
analyzed: de dang po'i tshig dang / bar pa'i tshig gnyis las bar mas thob ste /
translated: From that, the first word and the two middle words are obtained in the middle.

original: pa tsa la bar ma'i byed tshig gnyis pa thas dang / bar du aan\ sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: pa tsa la bar ma'i byed tshig gnyis pa thas dang / bar du aan\ sbyar ba'o //
translated: In pacati, the second middle verb is tha, and in the middle, an is connected.

original: sgrub ba gong bzhin no //
analyzed: sgrub ba gong bzhin no //
translated: The proof is as before.

original: pa tsa tha'o //🔽n'a m'i pra yu dzya m'a ne pra tha ma:/
analyzed: pa tsa tha'o //🔽n'a m'i pra yu dzya m'a ne pra tha ma:/
translated: It is pacati.🔽In the case of the present tense, the first.

original: ming dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa'i dh'a tu la dang po'i skyes bu 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: ming dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa'i dh'a tu la dang po'i skyes bu 'byung ba ste /
translated: The first person is produced in the dhatu which is endowed with the name.

original: bdag gi chig dang / gzhan gyi tshig gi ming ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi chig dang / gzhan gyi tshig gi ming ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: Except for the word 'I' and the word 'other'.

original: tat\ la si sbyar ba ni ming dang ldan pa ste de dang 'brel pas pa tsa la /
analyzed: tat\ la si sbyar ba ni ming dang ldan pa ste de dang 'brel pas pa tsa la /
translated: The connection with tals is the name-endowed, and by the connection with that, pacati.

original: brta m'a na'i ti dang / aan\ bar du sbyar //
analyzed: brta m'a na'i ti dang / aan\ bar du sbyar //
translated: The connection with the middle vṛddhi, and

original: sa pa tsa ti'o //
analyzed: sa pa tsa ti'o //
translated: pacati.

original: tad la aoo sbyar bas das aa thob ta dang sbyar ta aoo k'a re'i mdos /🔽aoo sbyar ba dang 'brel pas pa tsa la gnyis pa tas sbyar /
analyzed: tad la aoo sbyar bas das aa thob ta dang sbyar ta aoo k'a re'i mdos / aoo sbyar ba dang 'brel pas pa tsa la gnyis pa tas sbyar /
translated: By the connection with tad, the a is obtained, and the connection with ta, the a of ta is elided by the rule of the aṅgas.

original: too pa tsa ta:'o //
analyzed: too pa tsa ta:'o //
translated: By the connection with the second pacati, the ta is connected with the second.🔽pacati.

original: tad\ la dzas sbyar bas pa tsa la aanti'o //
analyzed: tad\ la dzas sbyar bas pa tsa la aanti'o //
translated: By the connection with tad, pacati.

original: te pa tsanti'o //
analyzed: te pa tsanti'o //
translated: pacati.

original: ming dang ya sbyar bar yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste ;
analyzed: ming dang ya sbyar bar yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste ;
translated: The connection with ya is also produced in the name.

original: ti la sogs pa'i ming gong na med kyang ngo //
analyzed: ti la sogs pa'i ming gong na med kyang ngo //
translated: Although there is no name beginning with ti,

original: pa tsa la ti sbyar /
analyzed: pa tsa la ti sbyar /

original: bar du aan sbyar /
analyzed: bar du aan sbyar /
translated: The middle is connected with an.

original: pa tsa ti'o //🔽pa tsa la tas dang aan sbyar /
analyzed: pa tsa ti'o // pa tsa la tas dang aan sbyar /

original: pa tsa ta:'o //
analyzed: pa tsa ta:'o //
translated: pacati.

analyzed: pa tsa la aanti sbyar te /

original: pa tsanti'o / //
analyzed: pa tsanti'o / //

original: /'dir gzugs bsgrub pa ni ma bris te /
analyzed: /'dir gzugs bsgrub pa ni ma bris te /

analyzed: yushma dis sbyar bar gyur ba'i dh'a tu la skyes bu bar ma 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /

translated: The syllable uṣma is

analyzed: pa tsa la tha dang / aan sbyar /

analyzed: pa tsa tha /

original: // / aasmadyut tam:/
analyzed: // / aasmadyut tam:/

original: bdag gi tshig can dang rab tu 'brel pa'i dh'a tu la skyes bu mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /🔽pa tsa la brta m'a na me sbyar /
analyzed: bdag gi tshig can dang rab tu 'brel pa'i dh'a tu la skyes bu mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste / pa tsa la brta m'a na me sbyar /

analyzed: bar du aan sbyar na phyi / aa dang tsa sbyar /
translated: In the middle, the affix an is added.🔽The result is pacāmi.

analyzed: aasya wa mo d'argis tsa srings pa'o //
translated: In the case of pacati, the affix asya, the affix vṛddhi, and the affix argi are added.

original: aa he pa ts'a ti'o //
analyzed: aa he pa ts'a ti'o //

analyzed: pa tsa la was\ dang aan\ sbyar ba'o // a'a bam pa tse wa'o //

analyzed: pa tsi la mas dang aan sbyar ro //

analyzed: pa ya pa tsa ma:'o //

analyzed: bdag gi tshig can dang ma 'brel pa la'ang 'byung ste /

analyzed: pa tsa la mi dang aan sbyar bas pa tsa mi'o //

analyzed: pa ts'a ma:'o // a'a d'a pra d'a dhoo d'a /

analyzed: do zhes bya ba dum bu'o //

analyzed: // / k'a le /🔽gang 'di ni 'og nas 'chad pa'i dus yin pa ste /

original: sam pra ti warta m'a n'a /
analyzed: sam pra ti warta m'a n'a /

analyzed: bar du aan\ sbyar bas / pa tsa ti'o ; / pa tha la ti dang aan sbyar bas /

analyzed: ba tha ti'o / // / smee n'a t'i ti /

original: sma'i sgra dang 'brel ba'i dh'a tu 'das pa'i dus la brta m'a na 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sma'i sgra dang 'brel ba'i dh'a tu 'das pa'i dus la brta m'a na 'byung bar 'gyur te /

original: sma dang 'brel pas ma ta bi la brta m'a na ti sbyar yang 'das pa'i dus kyi don brjod pa'o zhes smras so zhes pa'o zhes mkhan pos gsungs so zhes pa'o//
analyzed: sma dang 'brel pas ma ta bi la brta m'a na ti sbyar yang 'das pa'i dus kyi don brjod pa'o zhes smras so zhes pa'o zhes mkhan pos gsungs so zhes pa'o//
translated: Because of the connection with sm, mat is added to vi. It is said that the master says that it expresses the meaning of the past time.

original: 'di yang gong dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: 'di yang gong dang 'dra'o //
translated: This is also like the above.

original: na nu'i sgra nye ba'i tshig tu gyur pa'i dh'a tu 'das pa'i dus la brta m'a na 'byung bar gsungs te /
analyzed: na nu'i sgra nye ba'i tshig tu gyur pa'i dh'a tu 'das pa'i dus la brta m'a na 'byung bar gsungs te /
translated: The word nanu becomes a near word. The dhātu is said to be varttamāna in the past time.

original: lhas byin gyis re lde byas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhas byin gyis re lde byas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, “Devadatta did.”

original: na nu dang 'brel pas k'a ra la brta m'a na mi sbyar yang 'das pa'i dus brjod pa'o //
analyzed: na nu dang 'brel pas k'a ra la brta m'a na mi sbyar yang 'das pa'i dus brjod pa'o //
translated: Because of the connection with the affix, the affix ta is not added to kara, but it is said to be past time.

original: bdag gis byas so zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: bdag gis byas so zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: It means “I did.”🔽The affix parāṅ-kṣa is added to the past time dātu,

original: // / pa ro& ksh'a /'das pa'i dus kyi dh'a tu la pa ro& ksh'a 'byung bar 'gyur te /🔽lkog tu gyur pa /
analyzed: // / pa ro& ksh'a /'das pa'i dus kyi dh'a tu la pa ro& ksh'a 'byung bar 'gyur te / lkog tu gyur pa /

original: kri la pa ro& ksh'a aat\ sbyar bas ri aar du 'phel tshig gnyis ka kri byas te /
analyzed: kri la pa ro& ksh'a aat\ sbyar bas ri aar du 'phel tshig gnyis ka kri byas te /

original: aa bya sa ti sham gyi mdos ri phyi /
analyzed: aa bya sa ti sham gyi mdos ri phyi /

original: ka las tsa byas pa ste 'das pa'i dus brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ka las tsa byas pa ste 'das pa'i dus brjod pa'o //

original: tsa k'a ra b'a ma nam au pa me'o //
analyzed: tsa k'a ra b'a ma nam au pa me'o //

original: hri la pa roksh'a aat sbyar bas /
analyzed: hri la pa roksh'a aat sbyar bas /

original: ri a'ar\ du 'phel hri gnyis pa bya ste /
analyzed: ri a'ar\ du 'phel hri gnyis pa bya ste /

original: ri phyi / ho tsi'i mdos ha las dza byas pa'o //
analyzed: ri phyi / ho tsi'i mdos ha las dza byas pa'o //

analyzed: dza h'a ra pri thi bi pa le:'o // bhu ta ka ra na ba tyashtsa /

analyzed: dh'a tu 'das pa'i dus su byung bar gyur bar gyur pa bya ba dang ldan pa la /

analyzed: aadya ta ni'i dpe ni 'das pa tsam kho na ste /

original: de la ni khyad par du bya ba med do //
analyzed: de la ni khyad par du bya ba med do //
translated: And in that, there is no special formation.

original: gang du bya ba 'das par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: gang du bya ba 'das par gyur pa ste /
translated: Where the action has passed,

original: bya ba ma rdzogs pa de ni kri y'a ti pa tti 'o //
analyzed: bya ba ma rdzogs pa de ni kri y'a ti pa tti 'o //
translated: that incomplete action is kriya-tani.

original: bhudza\ la syat sbyar bas bhu bhor 'phel /
analyzed: bhudza\ la syat sbyar bas bhu bhor 'phel /
translated: By connecting bhu- with asya, bhu-bhor increases.

original: dzas ka thob /
analyzed: dzas ka thob /
translated: By ja, ka is obtained.

original: sas\ sha thob ste sbyar aa thog mar sbyar ro //
analyzed: sas\ sha thob ste sbyar aa thog mar sbyar ro //
translated: By sa, sha is obtained. a is connected at the beginning.

original: bha bishyanti ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus tha mal pa ste /
analyzed: bha bishyanti ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus tha mal pa ste /
translated: Bhaviṣyanti is the ordinary future time.

original: de la khyad par du bya ba ni med do //
analyzed: de la khyad par du bya ba ni med do //
translated: And in that, there is no special formation.

original: shis par brjod pa dang 'brel pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus la a'a shish yi rkyen 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: shis par brjod pa dang 'brel pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus la a'a shish yi rkyen 'byung ba'o //
translated: In the future time connected with benediction, the a of aśiṣ is the condition.

original: dz'i ba la a'a shisha'i y'at sbyar bas /
analyzed: dz'i ba la a'a shisha'i y'at sbyar bas /
translated: By connecting jīva with aśiṣyāt,
jīva becomes jīvat.

original: byatbha b'an\'o // sang nas brtsams pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus la ni //
analyzed: byatbha b'an\'o // sang nas brtsams pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus la ni //
translated: In the future time beginning from tomorrow,

original: shvasta n'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: shvasta n'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: it is śva-tani.

original: shva aa dhyi la rkyen ta sbyar bas ai aer 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: shva aa dhyi la rkyen ta sbyar bas ai aer 'phel ba'o //
translated: By connecting śva with adhi, the a increases to ai.

original: sho dhye ta'o //🔽pra yo ga ta shtsa /🔽sngon gyi slob dpon gyis sbyar ba'i dbang gis da ltar ba la sogs pa'i dus rnams la /

original: byed pa'i tshig rnams la kyang khyad par du khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: byed pa'i tshig rnams la kyang khyad par du khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: By the power of the application of the former masters, the verbal roots are also to be understood in the present and other times.

original: y'a bad\ bhud la brta m'a n'a'i te sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: y'a bad\ bhud la brta m'a n'a'i te sbyar ba'o //
translated: The verbal roots are applied to the present time.

original: y'a batbhu tte'o //🔽p'u r'a bhuta la brta m'a na'i te sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: y'a batbhu tte'o // p'u r'a bhuta la brta m'a na'i te sbyar ba'o //

original: p'u r'a bhutte'o /
analyzed: p'u r'a bhutte'o /
translated: pûrvam bhavati.🔽pûrvam bhavati.

original: panytsa mya nu ma to //
analyzed: panytsa mya nu ma to //
translated: pañca manuttamaḥ.

original: mngon par rtogs pa'i don gyi dh'a tu la byed pa'i tshig lnga pa 'byung ba ste ;
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'i don gyi dh'a tu la byed pa'i tshig lnga pa 'byung ba ste ;

analyzed: ae bam\ aa pa la banytsa mi'i tu sbyar bas /

analyzed: ae bam pa la tu'o // ae bam bha ba la /

analyzed: panytsa mi tu sbyar ro //

analyzed: ae bam bha ba tu'o // ae bam ku ru la hi sbyar te au k'a ratstsha sa hi phyi ba'o //

original: ae bam ku ru'o //

analyzed: dh'a tu'i pa dang sa sbyar /

original: dzu gupsa te'o //
analyzed: dzu gupsa te'o //

original: ti dza la sa\n sbyar bas ti dza\ gnyis pa byas /
analyzed: ti dza la sa\n sbyar bas ti dza\ gnyis pa byas /
translated: By applying san to ti j, ti j is doubled.

original: dza\ phyi / dh'a tu'i dzas ka thob /
analyzed: dza\ phyi / dh'a tu'i dzas ka thob /
translated: The ja of dhātu obtains ka.

original: sas sha thob bo //
analyzed: sas sha thob bo //
translated: Sa obtains śa.

original: ti ti kash te'o //
analyzed: ti ti kash te'o //

original: kita\ la san sbyin ki ta\ gnyis pa byas /
analyzed: kita\ la san sbyin ki ta\ gnyis pa byas /
translated: By applying san to ki t, ki t is doubled.

original: kas tsa thob /
analyzed: kas tsa thob /
translated: Ka obtains ca.

original: tsi kat+siti 'o //
analyzed: tsi kat+siti 'o //
translated: It becomes ci ki t.

original: smad pa dang / bzod pa dang / nad bzlog pa'i don rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dh'a tu rnams la rkyen @36b san 'byung bar 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: smad pa dang / bzod pa dang / nad bzlog pa'i don rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dh'a tu rnams la rkyen @36b san 'byung bar 'thad pa'o //
translated: In the case of the meanings of contempt, patience, and curing illness, the conditions san and na occur in the dhātus in the proper order.

original: dngos dpe gong ma ste /
analyzed: dngos dpe gong ma ste /
translated: The actual example is as above.

original: san sbyar bas dh'a tu'i don bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: san sbyar bas dh'a tu'i don bsgyur ba'o //
translated: By adding san, the meaning of dhātu is changed.

original: m'a na wa dh'a d'a n'a sh'a nantyo d'irgha shts'a bhy'a sa sya /
analyzed: m'a na wa dh'a d'a n'a sh'a nantyo d'irgha shts'a bhy'a sa sya /

original: m'a na zhes pa ni rjed pa'o //
analyzed: m'a na zhes pa ni rjed pa'o //
translated: Māna means to honor.

original: bha na zhes pa ni 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: bha na zhes pa ni 'chi ba'o //
translated: Bhana means to die.

original: d'a na zhes pa ni gtong ba'o //
analyzed: d'a na zhes pa ni gtong ba'o //
translated: Dāna means to give.

original: sh'an zhes pa 'dar ba'o //
analyzed: sh'an zhes pa 'dar ba'o //

original: de rnams la rkyen san\ 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / aa bhyas bsring ba yang ngo //
analyzed: de rnams la rkyen san\ 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / aa bhyas bsring ba yang ngo //
translated: The conditions san and na occur in those, and there is also lengthening by abhyāsa.

original: man\ la san sbyar bas man gnyis pa byas na phyi /
analyzed: man\ la san sbyar bas man gnyis pa byas na phyi /

analyzed: san\ ni barna sya'i mdos ma god mas ai thob ste bsring ngo //

original: mi m'am sa te'o //
analyzed: mi m'am sa te'o //

analyzed: bha na la san sbyar bas ba gnyis pa bya ba la sogs pa gong bzhin /

original: bibhans te'o // dan\ la san\ sbyar bas da gnyis pa bya ste ai thob nas bsrings pa'o //
analyzed: bibhans te'o // dan\ la san\ sbyar bas da gnyis pa bya ste ai thob nas bsrings pa'o //

analyzed: bhu dza la tum sbyar bas dzas ka thob ste /

analyzed: bhu dza la san\ sbyar / bhu gnyis pa byas bhus bu thob /

analyzed: bhu dza zhes bya ba ni skyong ba dang / longs spyod pa dag ste /🔽byed par 'dod pa'o //
translated: bhuj + aṇ = bhuj.🔽bhuj + aṇ

original: kri la san sbyar bas ris ri thob ri\s air thob ste /
analyzed: kri la san sbyar bas ris ri thob ri\s air thob ste /

analyzed: aa bsring / kri gnyis pa bya ste /

original: kas tsa thob pa'o //
analyzed: kas tsa thob pa'o //

original: tsa karshi te /
analyzed: tsa karshi te /

analyzed: du kri nya ni byed pa'o //

analyzed: dogs pa'i don la san 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /

analyzed: khyi 'chi bar 'gyur zhes bdag dogs par 'gyur ba ste /

original: mri gnyis pa sbyar /
analyzed: mri gnyis pa sbyar /

original: ri phyi / dh'a tu ri ri aur 'gyur te /
analyzed: ri phyi / dh'a tu ri ri aur 'gyur te /

analyzed: sas sha thob pa dang sbyar ro //

analyzed: shv'a mu mursha ti'o //

analyzed: mrid\ zhes bya ba'i ni srog gtong bar byed pa'o //

analyzed: n'amna aatmetstsha y'am yin /

analyzed: ming gi rtags kyi las bdag 'dod pa'i don la rkyen yin\ 'byung ba'am /

analyzed: bdag tu 'dod pa ste ;

original: pu tra la rkyen yin sbyar /
analyzed: pu tra la rkyen yin sbyar /

original: na dang ai phyi /

original: aan\ sbyar nas ya dang ma sbyar /
analyzed: aan\ sbyar nas ya dang ma sbyar /

analyzed: yin\ ni barna sya'i mdos tas\ ai thob pa'o //

original: pu tri ya ti'o //
analyzed: pu tri ya ti'o //

original: bdag snam bu 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: bdag snam bu 'dod pa ste /

analyzed: ma'i mtha' can dang @37a * // tshig phrad la /

analyzed: rkyen yin\ mi 'byung ba ste /

analyzed: 'di bdag nyid 'dod pa na mas mchod pa'i don yin\ na /

original: yin 'byung bar gsungs te /
analyzed: yin 'byung bar gsungs te /

original: na mas la yin\ sbyar /
analyzed: na mas la yin\ sbyar /

original: ai dang na phyi /
analyzed: ai dang na phyi /

original: sa das ya sbyar ro //
analyzed: sa das ya sbyar ro //

original: na ma sya ya ti shi bama'o //
analyzed: na ma sya ya ti shi bama'o //

analyzed: bsnyen bskur dang rim gro'i don mang yang yin 'byung ste /

original: ba ti bas la yin sbyar /
analyzed: ba ti bas la yin sbyar /

original: na dang ai phyi /
analyzed: na dang ai phyi /

original: sa dang ya sbyar /
analyzed: sa dang ya sbyar /

original: ba ti ba sya ya ti /
analyzed: ba ti ba sya ya ti /

original: rta dang gyang /
analyzed: rta dang gyang /

analyzed: khyu mchog 'khrig pa 'dod pa'i don la thog mar thob pa'i yin 'byung bar gsungs te /

analyzed: aa shva la rkyen yin sbyar /

original: rkyen gyi thog mar sa thob /
analyzed: rkyen gyi thog mar sa thob /

original: na dang aa phyi /
analyzed: na dang aa phyi /

original: sa dang aa sbyar ;
analyzed: sa dang aa sbyar ;
translated: The sa and a are joined.

original: aa shva sya ti'o /
analyzed: aa shva sya ti'o /

original: bra sha la rkyen yin\ sbyar /
analyzed: bra sha la rkyen yin\ sbyar /

original: sa thob pa gong bzhin /
analyzed: sa thob pa gong bzhin /

analyzed: 'o ma dang lan tshva dag lhag par 'dod pa'i don las thog mar thob pa'i yin 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

original: ksh'i ra la yin sbyar bas sa thob pa gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: ksh'i ra la yin sbyar bas sa thob pa gong ma bzhin /

original: la ba na la yin\ sbyar /
analyzed: la ba na la yin\ sbyar /
translated: Lavana, of salt.

original: sa thob pa'o //
analyzed: sa thob pa'o //
translated: The case is as above.

original: la ba na sya ti'o //
analyzed: la ba na sya ti'o //
translated: Lavanasya, of salt.

original: k'a mya tsa /
analyzed: k'a mya tsa /

original: rtags bdag 'dod pa'i don can la /
analyzed: rtags bdag 'dod pa'i don can la /

original: rkyen k'a mya 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: rkyen k'a mya 'byung ba ste /

original: bdag nyid bu 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid bu 'dod pa ste /

original: pa tra la k'a mya sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: pa tra la k'a mya sbyar ba'o //

original: shu bha la k'a mya sbyar bas shu bha k'a mya te'o //
analyzed: shu bha la k'a mya sbyar bas shu bha k'a mya te'o //

original: au pa m'a n'a d'a ts'a re /
analyzed: au pa m'a n'a d'a ts'a re /

original: de lta bur spyod pa'i las kyi rtags kyi don la rkyen yin 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de lta bur spyod pa'i las kyi rtags kyi don la rkyen yin 'byung ba ste /
translated: The meaning is: the condition of the act of conduct like that.🔽The meaning is: conduct like a son, not a son.

original: bu ma yin pa bu ltar spyod pa ste ;
analyzed: bu ma yin pa bu ltar spyod pa ste ;
translated: Putra, son.

original: pu tra la rkyen yin sbyar /
analyzed: pu tra la rkyen yin sbyar /
translated: The suffix is added.

original: na dang ai phyis nas aan dang sbyar /
analyzed: na dang ai phyis nas aan dang sbyar /

original: yin ni barna syas tras ai thob pa'o /
analyzed: yin ni barna syas tras ai thob pa'o /

original: // / kattta r'a yis la lo pashtsa /
analyzed: // / kattta r'a yis la lo pashtsa /

original: byed pa po'i dpe sbyod pa'i rtags kyi don la rkyen a'a yi 'byung ba ste /🔽ai brjod don no //
analyzed: byed pa po'i dpe sbyod pa'i rtags kyi don la rkyen a'a yi 'byung ba ste / ai brjod don no //
translated: 1. The example of the agent is the mark of the object of the optative.

original: sa yang dbyi ba'o //
analyzed: sa yang dbyi ba'o //
translated: The optative is the meaning of the optative.🔽The syllable sa is elided.

original: tsa'i sgra ni 'dir rjes su smra ba ste /
analyzed: tsa'i sgra ni 'dir rjes su smra ba ste /
translated: The word ca is a particle of succession.

original: ji ltar slong du 'gro ba na ba lang khyer la shog / ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar slong du 'gro ba na ba lang khyer la shog / ces bya ba ste /
translated: As in the expression Come with the cow,

original: des na gang du sa yod pa de dbyi ba dang / gang du sa med pa der yang a'a yi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: des na gang du sa yod pa de dbyi ba dang / gang du sa med pa der yang a'a yi 'byung ba'o //
translated: where sa is elided and the optative is added.

original: bya rog khra ltar sbyod pa shye na la rkyen a'a ya sbyar /🔽mas ma d'irghas so //
analyzed: bya rog khra ltar sbyod pa shye na la rkyen a'a ya sbyar / mas ma d'irghas so //
translated: The expression like a crow and a hawk is

original: dmangs rigs dang bram ze lta bur sbyod pa /🔽brahma na la a'a ya sbyar ba gong bzhin /🔽chu 'o ma lta bur sbyod pa'o //
analyzed: dmangs rigs dang bram ze lta bur sbyod pa / brahma na la a'a ya sbyar ba gong bzhin / chu 'o ma lta bur sbyod pa'o //
translated: the expression like a śūdra and a brahmin.🔽 The expression like water and milk is

original: pa yas\ la a'a ya sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /🔽aapsar ya te'o //
analyzed: pa yas\ la a'a ya sbyar bas gong ma bzhin / aapsar ya te'o //
translated: the expression like a river and the ocean.🔽 The expression like a cloud and the earth is

analyzed: yang na ba yas la aa sbyar bas byanydzan aan tad aa phyi ste sa dang ya sbyar ba'o //
translated: the expression like a cloud and the earth.

original: aa pa ras la a'a ya sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: aa pa ras la a'a ya sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /
translated: The same as above, with aparāsa and āya.

original: drod dang / rlangs pa dang / dbu ba rnams 'byung @37b ba'i don la rkyen la a'a ya sbyar bas gong ma bzhin du gsungs te /
analyzed: drod dang / rlangs pa dang / dbu ba rnams 'byung @37b ba'i don la rkyen la a'a ya sbyar bas gong ma bzhin du gsungs te /

original: drod 'byung ba zhes bya /
analyzed: drod 'byung ba zhes bya /

original: aushma la rkyen a'a ya sbyar bas sa ma na d'irgha'o //
analyzed: aushma la rkyen a'a ya sbyar bas sa ma na d'irgha'o //
translated: With the condition āya applied to the sibilants, it is samāna dīrgha.

original: b'ashpa la a'a ya sbyar bas gong ma bzhin //
analyzed: b'ashpa la a'a ya sbyar bas gong ma bzhin //
translated: The same as above, with āya applied to vaśpa.

original: phe na la a'a ya sbyar ba gong ma bzhin phe n'a ya ta'o //
analyzed: phe na la a'a ya sbyar ba gong ma bzhin phe n'a ya ta'o //
translated: The same as above, with āya applied to phena, it is phenāyata.

original: aink'a ri tam tsa dh'a tvarththe /
analyzed: aink'a ri tam tsa dh'a tvarththe /

original: dh'a tu'i don can gyi ming bstan par bya ba yin na rkyen ain 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: dh'a tu'i don can gyi ming bstan par bya ba yin na rkyen ain 'byung ba ste /
translated: If the name is to be taught as having the meaning of “element,” the condition inka arises.

original: de yang ming k'a ri ta zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de yang ming k'a ri ta zhes bya'o //

original: bastram rtags yin la kri dh'a tu'o //
analyzed: bastram rtags yin la kri dh'a tu'o //
translated: Bastra is the sign, and kṛdhātu.

original: bastra ain sbyar bas tr'i aa phyi ste sbyar ais ao thob /
analyzed: bastra ain sbyar bas tr'i aa phyi ste sbyar ais ao thob /

original: ae aa sa ya dang / aan\ gyi aa sbyar /
analyzed: ae aa sa ya dang / aan\ gyi aa sbyar /
translated: The ā of e and the ā of an are conjoined.

original: bastra ya ti'o //
analyzed: bastra ya ti'o //
translated: It is bāstrayati.

original: la ba na ma\ ni rtags yin /
analyzed: la ba na ma\ ni rtags yin /

original: kri ni dh'a tu yin pas bart'a m'a na'i ti sbyar ;
analyzed: kri ni dh'a tu yin pas bart'a m'a na'i ti sbyar ;

original: la ba nam\ aan\ la sogs pa sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: la ba nam\ aan\ la sogs pa sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /

original: la ba nam\ ka ro ti'o //🔽dh'a toshtsa he to //
analyzed: la ba nam\ ka ro ti'o // dh'a toshtsa he to //

original: rgyu'i don can gyi dh'a tu la rkyen ain\ 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu'i don can gyi dh'a tu la rkyen ain\ 'byung ba ste /
translated: The dhatu with the meaning of cause has the condition -in.

original: de yang min k'a ri ta zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de yang min k'a ri ta zhes bya'o //
translated: That is also called kārita.

original: kri la ain sbyar na phyi /
analyzed: kri la ain sbyar na phyi /
translated: When kṛ is combined with -in, it becomes -kṛt.

original: aa sya pa dh'a bri dh'i d'argh'a'i mdos ri a'ar du 'phel /
analyzed: aa sya pa dh'a bri dh'i d'argh'a'i mdos ri a'ar du 'phel /
translated: In the verse of the long a of asya padhāvṛtti, the r increases to ṛ.

original: ra dang ai sbyar ais ae thob ae a'a /
analyzed: ra dang ai sbyar ais ae thob ae a'a /
translated: When r and i are combined, i obtains e, and e becomes ṛ.

original: ya dang aan gyi ae sbyar /
analyzed: ya dang aan gyi ae sbyar /
translated: The e of ya and an is combined.

original: k'a ra ya ti'o //
analyzed: k'a ra ya ti'o //
translated: -kṛyate.

original: pa tsa la ain sbyar bas pa bsring ba la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no //
analyzed: pa tsa la ain sbyar bas pa bsring ba la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no //
translated: When pac is combined with -in, the p is lengthened, etc., as above.

original: p'a tsa ya ti'o //🔽tsu r'a deshtsa /
analyzed: p'a tsa ya ti'o // tsu r'a deshtsa /
translated: -pācyate.🔽-cūrādeśaśca.

original: tsu ra la sogs pa'i dh'a tu pa thar brjod pa rnams la rkyen ain 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: tsu ra la sogs pa'i dh'a tu pa thar brjod pa rnams la rkyen ain 'byung ba ste /
translated: The dhatus ending in -cū, etc., have the condition -in.

original: de yang ming k'a ri ta zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de yang ming k'a ri ta zhes bya'o //
translated: That is also called kārita.

original: tsu ra la ain sbyar bas tsu tsor gyur pa la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no //
analyzed: tsu ra la ain sbyar bas tsu tsor gyur pa la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no //
translated: When cū is combined with -in, it becomes cūc, etc., as above.

original: tso ra ya ti'o //🔽tsin ta la ain sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: tso ra ya ti'o // tsin ta la ain sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /
translated: cintāyāti.

original: tsinta ya ti'o //🔽laksha la ain\ sbyar bas gong bzhin //
analyzed: tsinta ya ti'o // laksha la ain\ sbyar bas gong bzhin //
translated: cintāyāti.

original: laksha ya ti'o //
analyzed: laksha ya ti'o //
translated: lakṣayāti.🔽lakṣayāti.

original: tsu ra zhes pa rku ba'o //
analyzed: tsu ra zhes pa rku ba'o //
translated: cura means “to steal.”

original: tsi ti zhes bya ba dran pa'o //
analyzed: tsi ti zhes bya ba dran pa'o //
translated: citti means “to remember.”

original: laksha zhes bya ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: laksha zhes bya ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: lakṣa means “to aim.”

original: ai ni ling+ga sya ne k'a ksha r'a sya n+y'a sv'a stv'a der lo pa: dbyangs tu ma'i rtags kyi pha rol na ai yod na gang dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' ma'i dang po de dbyi bas te /
analyzed: ai ni ling+ga sya ne k'a ksha r'a sya n+y'a sv'a stv'a der lo pa: dbyangs tu ma'i rtags kyi pha rol na ai yod na gang dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' ma'i dang po de dbyi bas te /
translated: The letter i is a substitute for the final letter of a vowel.

original: glang po las shin tu 'das pa ste /🔽aa ti hasta ni la rkyen ain sbyar bas mdo 'dis sti'i ai dang na phyi nas ain dang sbyar ba dang / aan\ dang sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: glang po las shin tu 'das pa ste / aa ti hasta ni la rkyen ain sbyar bas mdo 'dis sti'i ai dang na phyi nas ain dang sbyar ba dang / aan\ dang sbyar ba'o //
translated: “ atihasta” means “exceeding the elephant.”

original: aa ti has ya ti'o //🔽pi wang gis nye bar glu len pa /
analyzed: aa ti has ya ti'o // pi wang gis nye bar glu len pa /
translated: By adding the suffix “in” to “atihasta,” the i of “ati” is elided by this rule, and “in” is added.🔽“ atihasyati”

original: bi na la ain\ sbyar bas /
analyzed: bi na la ain\ sbyar bas /
translated: “vina” means “to sing with a lute.”

original: mdo 'dis na'i aa phyi ste sbyar ba dang / aan\ sbyar ro //
analyzed: mdo 'dis na'i aa phyi ste sbyar ba dang / aan\ sbyar ro //
translated: By adding the suffix “in” to “vina,” the a of “vina” is elided by this rule, and “in” is added.

original: bi na ya ti'o //
analyzed: bi na ya ti'o //
translated: “ vinayati”

original: sbom ba dang / thag ring ba dang / lang tsho dang / thung ngu dang / myur ba dang / phran tshogs rnams kyi 'og mtha'i aantastha dang / dang po'i @38a * //
analyzed: sbom ba dang / thag ring ba dang / lang tsho dang / thung ngu dang / myur ba dang / phran tshogs rnams kyi 'og mtha'i aantastha dang / dang po'i @38a * //
translated: The words for “thick,” “far,” “youth,” “short,” “quick,” and “small” are formed by adding the suffix antastha to the basic word.

original: yan lag dbyi ba dang / n'a mi yang gu na bya bar gsungs te /🔽sbom por brjod pa ste /🔽sthu la'i mthar ain\ sbyar bas /
analyzed: yan lag dbyi ba dang / n'a mi yang gu na bya bar gsungs te / sbom por brjod pa ste / sthu la'i mthar ain\ sbyar bas /
translated: The word for “beginning” is formed by adding the suffix dvyābha to the basic word.🔽The word for “thick” is formed by adding the suffix antastha to the basic word sthula.

original: aanta la phyi /🔽n'a mi au aor 'gyur /
analyzed: aanta la phyi / n'a mi au aor 'gyur /
translated: The final a of sthula is elided.🔽The final a of antastha is elided.🔽The final o of na is elided.

original: ao aab dang ai sbyar ba dang / aan sbyar ro //
analyzed: ao aab dang ai sbyar ba dang / aan sbyar ro //
translated: The final i of na is elided.

original: sthu la p'a tsashisath ba ya ti'o //🔽thag ring bar brjod pa ;
analyzed: sthu la p'a tsashisath ba ya ti'o // thag ring bar brjod pa ;
translated: The final a of sthula is elided.🔽The word for “far” is formed by adding the suffix antastha to the basic word dūra.

original: du ra la ain\ sbyar bas ra phyi /
analyzed: du ra la ain\ sbyar bas ra phyi /
translated: The final a of dūra is elided.🔽The final o of na is elided.🔽The final a of sthula is elided.🔽The word for “youth” is formed by adding the suffix antastha to the basic word hṛṣva.

original: au aor 'gyur /
analyzed: au aor 'gyur /
translated: The final va of hṛṣva is elided.

original: ao aab la sogs pa snga ma bzhin /🔽ya ba ya ti'o //🔽hri sva ba la ain\ sbyar bas /
analyzed: ao aab la sogs pa snga ma bzhin / ya ba ya ti'o // hri sva ba la ain\ sbyar bas /
translated: The final a of antastha is elided.🔽The word for “short” is formed by adding the suffix antastha to the basic word kṣiprā.

original: wa phyis sa dang ai sbyar te /
analyzed: wa phyis sa dang ai sbyar te /
translated: The final a of kṣiprā is elided.

original: aan sbyar / hra sa ya ti'o //🔽dakshi tra la ain\ sbyar bas na phyi /
analyzed: aan sbyar / hra sa ya ti'o // dakshi tra la ain\ sbyar bas na phyi /
translated: The final a of antastha is elided.

original: ai aer gyur pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ai aer gyur pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word for “quick” is formed by adding the suffix antastha to the basic word dakṣiṇā.

original: kshe da ya ti'o ;
analyzed: kshe da ya ti'o ;
translated: The final a of dakṣiṇā is elided.🔽The final a of antastha is elided.🔽The word for “small” is formed by adding the suffix antastha to the basic word kṣema.

original: / ra shabda ri to rla gho byam dza n'a de: gsal byed na pha rol na yod pa'i ri srab mo'i pha rol na ain\ yod na ra gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: / ra shabda ri to rla gho byam dza n'a de: gsal byed na pha rol na yod pa'i ri srab mo'i pha rol na ain\ yod na ra gzhag pa ste /
translated: The word ra is placed after the sibilant sa when it is followed by a light consonant, as in rasavat (possessing taste).

original: mtha'i thog pa'i dbyangs kyang dbyi'o //🔽rgya che bar brjod pa ste /
analyzed: mtha'i thog pa'i dbyangs kyang dbyi'o // rgya che bar brjod pa ste /
translated: The final vowel is also elided.

original: pri thu la rkyen ain sbyar bas mdo 'dis ris ra thob /
analyzed: pri thu la rkyen ain sbyar bas mdo 'dis ris ra thob /
translated: The word pṛthu (vast) is lengthened by the addition of the suffix in in this rule.

original: mtha'i dbyangs su au phyi ba dang / ais\ ae thob /🔽ae aa ya /
analyzed: mtha'i dbyangs su au phyi ba dang / ais\ ae thob / ae aa ya /
translated: The final vowel is elided, and the vowel i is lengthened to ī.

original: ya aan\ gyi aa sbyar ro //
analyzed: ya aan\ gyi aa sbyar ro //
translated: The word āyā (come) is formed.🔽 The final vowel is elided, and the vowel a is added to the final consonant.

original: pra tha ya ti'o //🔽'jam por brjod pa /
analyzed: pra tha ya ti'o // 'jam por brjod pa /
translated: The word prathāyate (is extended) is formed.

original: mri du la ain\ sbyar bas gong bzhin /
analyzed: mri du la ain\ sbyar bas gong bzhin /
translated: The word mṛdu (soft) is lengthened by the addition of the suffix in in this rule.

original: mra ta ya ti'o //
analyzed: mra ta ya ti'o //
translated: The word mṛdāyate (is softened) is formed.

original: yang ba zhes ci'i phyir smos she na /
analyzed: yang ba zhes ci'i phyir smos she na /
translated: Why is light mentioned?

original: bri'i pha rol na ksha mthug pa yod pas ris ra ma thob /
analyzed: bri'i pha rol na ksha mthug pa yod pas ris ra ma thob /
translated: Because the thick sibilant kṣa is placed after the sibilant s, the sibilant s is not lengthened.

original: ri nyid yang ba yin yang /
analyzed: ri nyid yang ba yin yang /
translated: Although the sibilant s itself is light,

original: briksha ya ti'o //
analyzed: briksha ya ti'o //
translated: the word kṣipraṃ (quickly) is formed.

original: dh'a to re ka sva ra dvya shab da shtse kri y'a sa ma bhi h'a re /
analyzed: dh'a to re ka sva ra dvya shab da shtse kri y'a sa ma bhi h'a re /
translated: The word dhātottarekṣarasvaryaśabdapadascekriyāsamābhirāre (the one who delights in the recitation of the essence of the elements) is formed.🔽 The word dhātu (element) is lengthened by the addition of the suffix in in this rule.🔽 The final vowel is elided, and the vowel a is added to the final consonant.

original: gang dbyangs gcig pa'i dh'a tu gsal byed thog ma na yod pa bya ba yang du byed pa'i don yin par gyur na rkyen ya'i sgra 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: gang dbyangs gcig pa'i dh'a tu gsal byed thog ma na yod pa bya ba yang du byed pa'i don yin par gyur na rkyen ya'i sgra 'byung ba ste /
translated: If the dhātu that is the first consonant of the single-syllabled [vowel] is in the sense of making, then the sound of the suffix ya arises.

original: de'i ming tse kri yi ta zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ming tse kri yi ta zhes bya'o //
translated: Its name is cetrīyita.

original: yang dang yang du byed pa'am /
analyzed: yang dang yang du byed pa'am /
translated: Again and again making,

original: lhag par byed pa'i don la ni kri ya sa ma bhi ha ra zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lhag par byed pa'i don la ni kri ya sa ma bhi ha ra zhes bya'o //
translated: or in the sense of making superior, is kṛtyasambhīhara.

original: mchod sbyin yang dang yang du byed pa'am /
analyzed: mchod sbyin yang dang yang du byed pa'am /
translated: Again and again making sacrifice,

original: lhag par byed pa'am /
analyzed: lhag par byed pa'am /
translated: or making superior,

original: ya dza la rkyen ya sbyar bas /
analyzed: ya dza la rkyen ya sbyar bas /
translated: or ya-ja with the suffix ya attached,

original: ya dza gnyis pa gong du sbyar /
analyzed: ya dza gnyis pa gong du sbyar /
translated: the second ya-ja is attached above.

original: dza phyi / dh'a tu'i ya dang dza sbyar te /
analyzed: dza phyi / dh'a tu'i ya dang dza sbyar te /
translated: The ya of dhātu is attached to ja,

original: d'irga n'a ga manta sya'i mdos aa gong ma bsring ba'o//
analyzed: d'irga n'a ga manta sya'i mdos aa gong ma bsring ba'o//
translated: and the long ā of dīrgha is extended above.

original: y'a ya dzya ti'o //🔽yang dang yang du klog pa'am /
analyzed: y'a ya dzya ti'o // yang dang yang du klog pa'am /
translated: It is yā-yaj-ti.🔽Again and again reading,

original: lhag par klog la /
analyzed: lhag par klog la /
translated: or reading superior,

original: pa tha la ya sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: pa tha la ya sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /
translated: with pa-tha and ya attached as above,

original: su tsi dang / su tri dang / pu tri rnams ain gyi mtha' can dbyangs du ma rnams la rkyen ya gsungs te /
analyzed: su tsi dang / su tri dang / pu tri rnams ain gyi mtha' can dbyangs du ma rnams la rkyen ya gsungs te /
translated: suci, sutra, putra, and so on, ending in in, with many vowels, the suffix ya is stated.

original: su tsi la ya sbyar bas gong du su tsi gnyis pa byas tsi phyi /
analyzed: su tsi la ya sbyar bas gong du su tsi gnyis pa byas tsi phyi /
translated: By adding yaya to sucya, the first sucya becomes cyaya.

original: dh'a tu'i @38b tsa'i ai phyi ste ya dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dh'a tu'i @38b tsa'i ai phyi ste ya dang sbyar ro //
translated: The i of cyaya is elided, and it is connected with ya.

original: pu tri la ya sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: pu tri la ya sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /
translated: By adding yaya to putriya, the first four are as above.

original: so su trya te'o //
analyzed: so su trya te'o //
translated: The second is susucita.🔽By adding yaya to mutriya, the first four are as above.

original: mu tri la ya sbyar bas mo ma trya te'o //
analyzed: mu tri la ya sbyar bas mo ma trya te'o //
translated: The second is mamutriya.

original: 'khyog cing 'gro ba'i don la rkyen ya 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: 'khyog cing 'gro ba'i don la rkyen ya 'byung ba ste /
translated: For the meaning of going crookedly, the suffix ya occurs.

original: ku ti la /
analyzed: ku ti la /
translated: By adding yaya to kuṭi, it becomes kuṭiyaya.

original: 'khyog cing 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'khyog cing 'gro ba'o //
translated: Going crookedly is kuṭi.🔽By adding yaya to ādhyā, the first two are as above.

original: a'a t'a la ya sbyar bas dva r'a de r'i ya sya ya'i mdos ta gnyis pa byas te ;
analyzed: a'a t'a la ya sbyar bas dva r'a de r'i ya sya ya'i mdos ta gnyis pa byas te ;
translated: The second is dvāradārikā.

original: ya phyi ba dang / sring ba gong ma'i bzhin /
analyzed: ya phyi ba dang / sring ba gong ma'i bzhin /
translated: By adding yaya to ādhyā, the first four are as above.

original: a'a t'a ty'a te'o /
analyzed: a'a t'a ty'a te'o /
translated: The second is ādhyāyaya.

original: // / gu pu dhu pa bitstsha pa ni pa ni r'a ya:gu pu ni srung ba'o //
analyzed: // / gu pu dhu pa bitstsha pa ni pa ni r'a ya:gu pu ni srung ba'o //
translated: Guṇadhupavicchapanirāyaguṇi means the protector.

original: dhu pa ni kun du gdung ba'o //
analyzed: dhu pa ni kun du gdung ba'o //
translated: Dhupa means to be tormented.

original: bi tsha ni 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: bi tsha ni 'gro ba'o //
translated: Viccha means to go.

original: pa na ni tha dad do //
analyzed: pa na ni tha dad do //
translated: Pan means to be different.

original: pa na yang tha snyad do //
analyzed: pa na yang tha snyad do //
translated: Pan also means to be conventional.

original: de rnams la rkyen a'a ya 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams la rkyen a'a ya 'byung ba ste /
translated: For those, the suffix ya occurs.

original: gup\ la a'a ya sbyar ba ste /
analyzed: gup\ la a'a ya sbyar ba ste /
translated: By adding ya to guṇ, it becomes guṇaya.

original: n'a mi nashtso pa ti'i mdos gu gor gyur pa'o //🔽go p'a ya ti'o //
analyzed: n'a mi nashtso pa ti'i mdos gu gor gyur pa'o // go p'a ya ti'o //
translated: The root nam with the suffix -inś- and the prefix upa- becomes upa-na-min-śati.

original: dh'u pa la a'a ya sbyar ba'o //🔽dh'u p'a ya ti'o //🔽bi tsha la a'a ya sbyar bas /
analyzed: dh'u pa la a'a ya sbyar ba'o // dh'u p'a ya ti'o // bi tsha la a'a ya sbyar bas /
translated: The root gam with the suffix -ā- and the prefix go- becomes go-pa-yā-ti.🔽The root dhū with the suffix -ā- and the prefix upa- becomes upa-dhū-yā-ti.

original: bi tsh'a ya ti'o //🔽pa na la a'a ya sbyar bas /
analyzed: bi tsh'a ya ti'o // pa na la a'a ya sbyar bas /
translated: The root viś with the suffix -ā- and the prefix upa- becomes upa-viś-ā-ti.

original: pa n'a ya ti'o //🔽pa na la a'a ya sbyar bas /
analyzed: pa n'a ya ti'o // pa na la a'a ya sbyar bas /
translated: The root pan with the suffix -ā- and the prefix upa- becomes upa-pa-yā-ti.

original: p'a n'a ya ti'o //🔽/ te dh'a ta wa /
analyzed: p'a n'a ya ti'o // / te dh'a ta wa /
translated: The root pan with the suffix -ā- and the prefix pa- becomes pa-na-yā-ti.🔽The root te with the suffix -dhā- and the prefix upa- becomes upa-te-dhā-ti.

original: gong du bshad pa'i san la sogs pa'i rkyen gyi mtha' can gyi tshogs de rnams kyi ming dh'a tu zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gong du bshad pa'i san la sogs pa'i rkyen gyi mtha' can gyi tshogs de rnams kyi ming dh'a tu zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The names of the groups of those ending in the conditions san and so forth explained above become dhatu.

original: gup\ la rkyen san sbyar bas gup\ gnyis pa byas /
analyzed: gup\ la rkyen san sbyar bas gup\ gnyis pa byas /
translated: By applying the condition san to guh, guh is made the second.

original: pa phyi / gas dza thob /
analyzed: pa phyi / gas dza thob /
translated: The root ksa is obtained.

original: dh'a tu'i pa dang sa sbyar /
analyzed: dh'a tu'i pa dang sa sbyar /
translated: The pa of dhatu is combined with sa.

original: dzu gup\ sa te'o //
analyzed: dzu gup\ sa te'o //
translated: The result is sa-guhp.

original: mang ga la rkyen yin sbyar bas /
analyzed: mang ga la rkyen yin sbyar bas /
translated: By applying the condition -ā- to mang,

original: yin ni barna sya'i mdo las ai thob ba'o ;
analyzed: yin ni barna sya'i mdo las ai thob ba'o ;
translated: the suffix -i is obtained from the sutra of Varṇasyai.

original: / mang+ga l'i ya ti'o //🔽su ta la rkyen k'a mye sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: / mang+ga l'i ya ti'o // su ta la rkyen k'a mye sbyar ba'o //
translated: The result is mangala-ā-ti.🔽The root suta is combined with the condition -ā- and the prefix ka-.

original: la ba na la rkyen yin sbyar bas ai aer gyur ao aa ya /
analyzed: la ba na la rkyen yin sbyar bas ai aer gyur ao aa ya /
translated: The suffix -i is applied to lavan, and the result is lavan-i. The vowel o is changed to a.

original: ya dang aan gyi aa sbyar /
analyzed: ya dang aan gyi aa sbyar /
translated: The ya and the a of an are joined.

original: la ba na ya ti'o //
analyzed: la ba na ya ti'o //
translated: The la and the va are joined.

original: pa tsa la rkyen ya sbyar bas /
analyzed: pa tsa la rkyen ya sbyar bas /
translated: The pa and the tsa are joined.

original: pa tsa gnyis pa byas /
analyzed: pa tsa gnyis pa byas /
translated: The second pa is made.🔽The tsa is made external.

original: tsa phyi / d'irgha n'a ga man sya'i n'a ga man sya'i mdos p'a srings pa'o //
analyzed: tsa phyi / d'irgha n'a ga man sya'i n'a ga man sya'i mdos p'a srings pa'o //

original: p'a pa tsya ti'o //
analyzed: p'a pa tsya ti'o //

analyzed: dh'a tu zhes bya ba yin na ti la sogs pa 'byung ba'o //
translated: If it is said dhatu, the ti and so forth occur.🔽The tsa and the ka are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.

analyzed: tsa k'a sk'a sra pra tya aante bhya aampa ro& ksh'a y'am /
translated: The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.🔽The ka and the sa are made external.

analyzed: ki la sbyar /

original: tsa k'a s'am tsa k'a ra /
analyzed: tsa k'a s'am tsa k'a ra /

analyzed: k'a sril a'am sbyar ba ae gong ma bzhin /
translated: kāśya or kāśya, e, as above.

original: k'a s'am ca kri /
analyzed: k'a s'am ca kri /

original: rkyen gyi @39a * //
analyzed: rkyen gyi @39a * //

original: mtha' can rnams la gup pa san sbyar gu gnyis pa byas te a'am sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: mtha' can rnams la gup pa san sbyar gu gnyis pa byas te a'am sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /
translated: are joined with guṇapāta, the second gu is made, and a is joined, as above.

original: pu tra la rkyen k'a mye sbyar te a'am sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: pu tra la rkyen k'a mye sbyar te a'am sbyar bas gong ma bzhin /

original: pu tra k'a my'am tsa k'a r'a'o //
analyzed: pu tra k'a my'am tsa k'a r'a'o //
translated: putra kāmyā or cakrakā.

original: pa tha la ya sbyar te a'am sbyar bas gong ma bzhin p'a p'a th'am tsakke'o //
analyzed: pa tha la ya sbyar te a'am sbyar bas gong ma bzhin p'a p'a th'am tsakke'o //
translated: patha is joined with ya, a is joined, as above. pāpātha or cakke.

original: gup\ la a'a ya sbyar te aam\ sbyar ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gup\ la a'a ya sbyar te aam\ sbyar ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: gupa is joined with āya, aṃ is joined, and so on.

original: go p'a y'am tsa ka ra:'o //
analyzed: go p'a y'am tsa ka ra:'o //
translated: gopāya or cakaraḥ.

original: n'a my'a dergu ru ma to& nr'itstsha: //
analyzed: n'a my'a dergu ru ma to& nr'itstsha: //

original: tha man n'a mi yod pa'i dh'a tu mthug pa dang yang ldan la /
analyzed: tha man n'a mi yod pa'i dh'a tu mthug pa dang yang ldan la /
translated: If there is a final name, it is also thick and light.

original: pha rol na pa ro& ksh'a yod na rkyen a'am 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol na pa ro& ksh'a yod na rkyen a'am 'byung ba'o //
translated: If there is para on the other side and kṣa, the condition aṃ arises.

original: ri tsa zhes bya ba ni dbang po nyams pa 'am brgyal ba'i ngo bo dag ste /
analyzed: ri tsa zhes bya ba ni dbang po nyams pa 'am brgyal ba'i ngo bo dag ste /

original: de ni ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: That is excluded.

original: a'iksha la a'am sbyar ba 'og tu kri gnyis pa sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: a'iksha la a'am sbyar ba 'og tu kri gnyis pa sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /

original: aiksh'a tsakkre'o // au ha la a'am sbyar gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: aiksh'a tsakkre'o // au ha la a'am sbyar gong ma bzhin /

original: a'u tr'am tsakra'o //
analyzed: a'u tr'am tsakra'o //
translated: auttaracakre.

original: aab\ dza la a'am\ sbyar gong bzhin /
analyzed: aab\ dza la a'am\ sbyar gong bzhin /

original: au ba dz'a tsa k'a ra'o //
analyzed: au ba dz'a tsa k'a ra'o //

original: aa nritstsha ai ti kimra ri la a'at sbyar bas ri gnyis pa byas /
analyzed: aa nritstsha ai ti kimra ri la a'at sbyar bas ri gnyis pa byas /

original: aa k'a ra ri barna sya'i mdos ras aa thob /
analyzed: aa k'a ra ri barna sya'i mdos ras aa thob /

original: bar du na thob /
analyzed: bar du na thob /

original: dh'a tu'i a'ar du 'gyur te /
analyzed: dh'a tu'i a'ar du 'gyur te /

original: aa dang na /
analyzed: aa dang na /

original: ra dang tsa sbyar ro //
analyzed: ra dang tsa sbyar ro //

original: a'a nar+tsha tu'o //
analyzed: a'a nar+tsha tu'o //

original: aa si da ya yi da re tra bhyashtsa /
analyzed: aa si da ya yi da re tra bhyashtsa /
translated: Asidayī dare tra bhyas.

original: aa pa zhes bya ba 'dug gnas te /
analyzed: aa pa zhes bya ba 'dug gnas te /

original: da ya zhes pa sbyin pa dang / 'gro ba dang srung ba rnams te /
analyzed: da ya zhes pa sbyin pa dang / 'gro ba dang srung ba rnams te /

original: aa ya ni 'gro ba'o//
analyzed: aa ya ni 'gro ba'o//
translated: Aya is going.

original: da ri tr'a ni ngan 'gro'o //🔽de rnams kyi pha rol na pa ro& ksh'a yod na a'am 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: da ri tr'a ni ngan 'gro'o // de rnams kyi pha rol na pa ro& ksh'a yod na a'am 'byung ba ste /

original: aa sa la pha rol na pa ro& ksh'a /
analyzed: aa sa la pha rol na pa ro& ksh'a /

original: ae yod pas sa la a'am sbyar /
analyzed: ae yod pas sa la a'am sbyar /

original: aam kri'i mdos 'og tu kri gnyis pa sbyar ro //
analyzed: aam kri'i mdos 'og tu kri gnyis pa sbyar ro //
translated: Since there is am, two kṛts are added below.

original: a'a s'am tsakre'o //
analyzed: a'a s'am tsakre'o //
translated: a is sa or cakra.

original: da ya a'am sbyar ba gong bzhin /
analyzed: da ya a'am sbyar ba gong bzhin /
translated: Since there is da, a is added as above.

original: da y'am tsakre'o //
analyzed: da y'am tsakre'o //

original: l'a ya ya aam sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: l'a ya ya aam sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /

original: pa tsa l'a y'am tsakre'o //
analyzed: pa tsa l'a y'am tsakre'o //

original: aa pa'i gong du ba ra sbyar te /
analyzed: aa pa'i gong du ba ra sbyar te /

original: ras la thob pa'o //
analyzed: ras la thob pa'o //

original: da ri dr'a la aam sbyar ba gong bzhin /
analyzed: da ri dr'a la aam sbyar ba gong bzhin /

original: da ri dr'am tsa k'a ra'o //
analyzed: da ri dr'am tsa k'a ra'o //

original: au sha bi da dza gri bho b'a /
analyzed: au sha bi da dza gri bho b'a /

original: au sha ni tshig pa'o //
analyzed: au sha ni tshig pa'o //

original: bi da ni rig pa'o //
analyzed: bi da ni rig pa'o //
translated: Vid is knowledge.

original: dz'a gri ni gnyid sad pa'o //
analyzed: dz'a gri ni gnyid sad pa'o //

original: de rnams kyi pha rol na pa ro& ksh'a yod na a'am 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi pha rol na pa ro& ksh'a yod na a'am 'byung ba'o //

analyzed: au sha la a'am sbyar ba pa ro& ksha aat\ sbyar bas 'og tu kri gnyis pa byas pa la sogs pa'o //

original: ao sh'a tsa k'a ra'o //
analyzed: ao sh'a tsa k'a ra'o //

original: bi da la a'am sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: bi da la a'am sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /

original: bi d'am tsa k'a ra'o //
analyzed: bi d'am tsa k'a ra'o //

original: dz'a gri la aam sbyar bas ri aar du 'gyur te sbyar /
analyzed: dz'a gri la aam sbyar bas ri aar du 'gyur te sbyar /

original: phyi ma gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: phyi ma gong ma bzhin /

original: @39b dz'a g'a ram tsa k'a ra'o //
analyzed: @39b dz'a g'a ram tsa k'a ra'o //

analyzed: bakshe au bo sha'o //

analyzed: bi be da'o /

analyzed: bhr'i aat\ sbyar bas bhri gnyis pa sbyar /

analyzed: // / a'ama'i krinya nu pra yu dzya te /

analyzed: a'am gyi mtha' can gyi sgra'i 'og tu krinya sbyar ba bya ba ste /

analyzed: a'am gyi mtha' can gyi sgra'i 'og tu a'as dang bhu 'di dag kyang sbyar bar bya ste /

analyzed: bdag gi tshig can gyi gnas su yang /

analyzed: gzhan gyi tshig can gzhag par bya'o //

analyzed: pha rol gyi bdag gi tshig can aes\ ae thob ste /

analyzed: aa sya sarwa tra'i mdos aa bsring /

original: ya gnyis pa phyi nas aa dang sbyar /
analyzed: ya gnyis pa phyi nas aa dang sbyar /

analyzed: aata'i aa dang sa sbyar /🔽a'iksh m'a pa'o //

analyzed: a'ik'i a'am\ gyi mtha' can la bhu sbyar pha rol gyi aes a'a @40a * //

analyzed: thob ; bhu gnyis pa byas /

original: bhu bonta sa 'og tu ba thob ste /
analyzed: bhu bonta sa 'og tu ba thob ste /

original: ae dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: ae dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is joined with e.

original: a'iksha ba bhu ba'o //
analyzed: a'iksha ba bhu ba'o //

original: a'iksha ni lta ba'o //
analyzed: a'iksha ni lta ba'o //
translated: Aksha means to see.

original: tsa ka s'a mal aas sbyar ba dang / pha rol na ae yod pa la sogs pa gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: tsa ka s'a mal aas sbyar ba dang / pha rol na ae yod pa la sogs pa gong ma bzhin /
translated: The final vowel of the first word is changed to a, and the final e of the second word is changed to a, and so on as before.

original: ts'a k'a s'a m'a sa'o //
analyzed: ts'a k'a s'a m'a sa'o //
translated: The first word is chak, and the second is sama.

original: tsa k'a s'am\ la bh'u sbyar ba dang ae sbyar ba gong ma bzhin /🔽tsa k'a s'a ba bhu ba /
analyzed: tsa k'a s'am\ la bh'u sbyar ba dang ae sbyar ba gong ma bzhin / tsa k'a s'a ba bhu ba /
translated: The final vowel of the first word is changed to a, and the final a of the second word is changed to e, and so on as before.

original: // / si dz'a dya ta n+y'am\/
analyzed: // / si dz'a dya ta n+y'am\/
translated: The first word is chak, and the second is bhuva.

original: dh'a tu'i pha rol na aa dya ta n'i rnams yod na rkyen si tsa 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: dh'a tu'i pha rol na aa dya ta n'i rnams yod na rkyen si tsa 'byung ba ste /
translated: If the first word ends in a vowel and the second word begins with a consonant, the condition sica occurs.

original: ai dang tsi dag ni si tsa pa ra smee'i mdo 'dis dbyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: ai dang tsi dag ni si tsa pa ra smee'i mdo 'dis dbyi bar bya'o //
translated: The i and c are elided by this rule of sica parasmma.

original: kri'i mthar sbyar pas bar du si tsa sbyar /
analyzed: kri'i mthar sbyar pas bar du si tsa sbyar /
translated: The sica is inserted between the two words.

original: thog mar aa sbyar /
analyzed: thog mar aa sbyar /
translated: The first word is joined with a.

original: ri aar du 'phel /
analyzed: ri aar du 'phel /
translated: The r increases to ar.

original: sas sha thob /🔽aid thob ste /
analyzed: sas sha thob / aid thob ste /
translated: The s becomes sha.🔽The final vowel is changed to i.

original: ai dang sbyar /
analyzed: ai dang sbyar /
translated: It is joined with i.

original: hri dang di sbyar bas bar du si tsa dang ai sbyar ba sogs gong bzhin /
analyzed: hri dang di sbyar bas bar du si tsa dang ai sbyar ba sogs gong bzhin /
translated: The hr and d are joined, and in the middle s and c are joined, and i is joined, and so forth, as above.

original: aa h'arshita'o // du krinya ni byed pa'o //
analyzed: aa h'arshita'o // du krinya ni byed pa'o //
translated: The a of a-harṣita is elided. Du-kṛt is the agent.

original: sa na ni dassi dant'a n'a myu ba dh'ad dri sha:/
analyzed: sa na ni dassi dant'a n'a myu ba dh'ad dri sha:/
translated: The sa of sa-nā is elided, and d-as-i is elided, and d-ant is elided, and ā-na is elided, and mya-va is elided, and dhā-da is elided, and dri-śa is elided.

original: dh'a tu shit\ kyi mtha' can n'a mi'i nye ba'i tshig tu 'gyur pa la aat ma gtogs pa'i san rkyen du 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: dh'a tu shit\ kyi mtha' can n'a mi'i nye ba'i tshig tu 'gyur pa la aat ma gtogs pa'i san rkyen du 'byung ba ste /
translated: The dhā-tu at the end becomes the nominal affix -na. Except for a-ta, it occurs as the third case ending.

original: dri shir\ zhes bya ba ni lta ba ste dh'a tu 'di ma gtogs pa'o //🔽ba sha'i / pha rol na di yod pas bar dus na sbyar /
analyzed: dri shir\ zhes bya ba ni lta ba ste dh'a tu 'di ma gtogs pa'o // ba sha'i / pha rol na di yod pas bar dus na sbyar /
translated: The dri-śa is elided, except for this dhā-tu.🔽The va of va-śi is elided, because there is di on the other side, and in the middle s is joined.

original: na phyi / sha do ka'i mdos shas ka thob /
analyzed: na phyi / sha do ka'i mdos shas ka thob /
translated: The śa of śa-tha is elided, and ka is obtained from the root.

original: sas sha thob pa dang sbyar /🔽aa biksha ta'o /
analyzed: sas sha thob pa dang sbyar / aa biksha ta'o /
translated: Sa is joined to the obtained śa.🔽The a of a-vi-kṣa-ta is elided, and so forth, as above.

original: kri sha la gong du aa sbyar ba la sogs pa gong bzhin no //🔽aa kri ksha ta'o //
analyzed: kri sha la gong du aa sbyar ba la sogs pa gong bzhin no // aa kri ksha ta'o //
translated: The a of a-kri-ṣa-ta is elided, and so forth, as above.

original: bu sha la gong du aa sbyar ba la sogs pa'o //🔽aa buksh'a ta'o //🔽ba sha ni 'jug pa'o //🔽kri sha ni rnam par rko ba'o //
analyzed: bu sha la gong du aa sbyar ba la sogs pa'o // aa buksh'a ta'o // ba sha ni 'jug pa'o // kri sha ni rnam par rko ba'o //
translated: The a of a-bu-kṣa-ta is elided, and so forth, as above.

original: du ha ni 'jo ba'o //
analyzed: du ha ni 'jo ba'o //
translated: The va of va-śa is elided, because there is śa on the other side, and in the middle s is joined.🔽The kri-śa is elided, because there is na on the other side, and in the middle s is joined.🔽The du-ha is elided, because there is na on the other side, and in the middle s is joined.

original: dri sha ma gtogs pa zhes ci'i phyir smos she na /
analyzed: dri sha ma gtogs pa zhes ci'i phyir smos she na /
translated: Why is it said, “except for the letter sha”?

original: dri sha la di sbyar ba yod kyang bar du san ma byung ste /
analyzed: dri sha la di sbyar ba yod kyang bar du san ma byung ste /
translated: Although the letter sha is connected with the letter di, the letter sa does not occur in between.

original: si tsa byung nas aid\ kyang sbyar /
analyzed: si tsa byung nas aid\ kyang sbyar /
translated: When the letter si occurs, the letter i is also connected.

original: aa dri ksha da'o //
analyzed: aa dri ksha da'o //
translated: The letter a is added to the letter dri.

original: shr'i dru sru ka mi k'a ri t'ante bya shtsa kart ri /
analyzed: shr'i dru sru ka mi k'a ri t'ante bya shtsa kart ri /
translated: The letter śrī is connected with the letter dru, the letter su, the letter ka, and the letter mu.

original: dru ni 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: dru ni 'gro ba'o //
translated: Dru means “to go.”

original: sru yang 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: sru yang 'gro ba'o //
translated: Su also means “to go.”

original: ka mu ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: ka mu ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: Ka means “to desire.”

original: de rnams kyi dh'a tu k'a ri ta'i mtha' can rnams la pha rol na byed pa po'i tshig can aa dya ta n'i rnams yod na rkyen tsan\ 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dh'a tu k'a ri ta'i mtha' can rnams la pha rol na byed pa po'i tshig can aa dya ta n'i rnams yod na rkyen tsan\ 'byung ba ste /
translated: When those have the suffix dhatu, if there is the word of the agent on the other side, the condition can is added.

original: shri la di sbyar bas gong du aa sbyar /
analyzed: shri la di sbyar bas gong du aa sbyar /
translated: Since the letter śrī is connected with the letter di, the letter a is added above.

original: gong du shri gnyis pa byas pas bar du tsan da dh'a tu shri'i ais ai ya thob /
analyzed: gong du shri gnyis pa byas pas bar du tsan da dh'a tu shri'i ais ai ya thob /
translated: Since the second śrī above is made, the letter i of the can dadhatu śrī is obtained in between.

original: ya dang a'i tsa sbyar ro //
analyzed: ya dang a'i tsa sbyar ro //
translated: The letter ya is connected with the letter i.

original: aa shi shri tsa ya\ta'o //🔽dru la di sbyar bas tsan\ sbyar ba sogs gong bzhin aa du dru bat\a'o //
analyzed: aa shi shri tsa ya\ta'o // dru la di sbyar bas tsan\ sbyar ba sogs gong bzhin aa du dru bat\a'o //
translated: The letter a is added to the letter śrī.🔽Since the letter dru is connected with the letter di, the letter can is added, and so on, as above.

original: sru la di sbyar pa sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sru la di sbyar pa sogs pa'o //
translated: The letter a is added to the letter dru.🔽The letter su is connected with the letter di, and so on.

original: aa sru sru bata'o //
analyzed: aa sru sru bata'o //
translated: Asau,  she is.

original: ka mu la aa dya ta n'i'i ta sbyar bas tsan sbyar te ka gnyis pa byas au phyi nas ba @40b dang tsa'i aa sbyar /
analyzed: ka mu la aa dya ta n'i'i ta sbyar bas tsan sbyar te ka gnyis pa byas au phyi nas ba @40b dang tsa'i aa sbyar /
translated: Kamulādyatanīti yasya sa kamulādyatanīti,  he who has a lotus as his origin.

original: aa tsa ka ma ta'o //
analyzed: aa tsa ka ma ta'o //
translated: Acakamat,  he thought.

original: k'a ri ta'i mtha' can rnams la kri la di sbyar bar du tsan\ sbyar /
analyzed: k'a ri ta'i mtha' can rnams la kri la di sbyar bar du tsan\ sbyar /
translated: Karītyantānāṃ kṛtirdīyate yāvat,  the kṛti affix is added to the words ending in karī.

original: gong du aa dang kri gnyis pa sbyar te /
analyzed: gong du aa dang kri gnyis pa sbyar te /
translated: The first a and the second kṛ are joined.

original: ai thob pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ai thob pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Idam,  this.

original: aa tsi ka ra ta'o //
analyzed: aa tsi ka ra ta'o //
translated: Acikarata,  he did.

original: hri la di sbyar bar du tsan sbyar gong bzhin /
analyzed: hri la di sbyar bar du tsan sbyar gong bzhin /
translated: Hṛdi dīyate yāvat,  the dī affix is added to hṛ.

original: aa dz'a ha ra ta'o //
analyzed: aa dz'a ha ra ta'o //
translated: Ajāharata,  he took.

original: aa n'a su wa tsi khy'a ti le pi si tsa hve:/
analyzed: aa n'a su wa tsi khy'a ti le pi si tsa hve:/
translated: Anāsuvacakṣātilīpsitacahaveḥ,  he who desires to speak, to proclaim, to teach, to drip, and to compete.

original: aa su ni gtong ba'o //🔽wa tsa ni smra ba'o //
analyzed: aa su ni gtong ba'o // wa tsa ni smra ba'o //
translated: Asuni,  he gives.🔽 Vacana,  speaking.

original: khy'a ni grags pa'o //
analyzed: khy'a ni grags pa'o //
translated: Cakṣā,  proclaiming.

original: li pa ni nye bar ston /
analyzed: li pa ni nye bar ston /
translated: Lipsi,  teaching.

original: shi tsa 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: shi tsa 'dzag pa'o //
translated: Sica,  dripping.

original: hve nya ni 'gran pa'o //
analyzed: hve nya ni 'gran pa'o //
translated: Hava,  competing.

original: 'di rnams kyi dh'a tu'i pha rol na byed pa po'i tshig can gyi aa dya ta n'i yod na rkyen aan 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi dh'a tu'i pha rol na byed pa po'i tshig can gyi aa dya ta n'i yod na rkyen aan 'byung ba ste /
translated: When these have the a dyatanī affix, which has the sense of an agent, the condition an is added.🔽 Apadyatanīti yasya sa apadyatanīti,  he who has a lotus as his origin.

original: aa pa la aadya ta ni'i ta sbyar /
analyzed: aa pa la aadya ta ni'i ta sbyar /
translated: The🔽word “only” is added to the above.🔽

original: bar du aan sbyar gong du ma sbyar /
analyzed: bar du aan sbyar gong du ma sbyar /
translated: In the middle, an is joined to a, not to a preceding syllable.

original: aa dya de'i mdos tha thob /
analyzed: aa dya de'i mdos tha thob /
translated: A and dya are obtained by the method of that.

original: sa dang aa dang aan gyi aa sbyar aa gong ma bsrings te /
analyzed: sa dang aa dang aan gyi aa sbyar aa gong ma bsrings te /
translated: a of sa and a of an are joined, and the preceding a is lengthened.

original: pa ri dang ai war+na'o //🔽watsa la di sbyi bas ao thob pa'o //
analyzed: pa ri dang ai war+na'o // watsa la di sbyi bas ao thob pa'o //
translated: Pari and ivarna.

original: aa bo tsa ta'o //
analyzed: aa bo tsa ta'o //
translated: Vatsa and la are joined, and o is obtained by the method of that.🔽 A and bo are joined.

original: khy'a la di sbyar /
analyzed: khy'a la di sbyar /
translated: Khaya and la are joined.

original: gong du a'a'o /
analyzed: gong du a'a'o /
translated: A is above.

original: aa ky'a ta'o //
analyzed: aa ky'a ta'o //
translated: A and khaya.

original: li pa la di sbyar /
analyzed: li pa la di sbyar /
translated: Lipa and la are joined.

original: gong du aa'o //
analyzed: gong du aa'o //
translated: A is above.

original: aa khy'a ta'o //
analyzed: aa khy'a ta'o //
translated: A and khaya.

original: a'a li btsa'o //
analyzed: a'a li btsa'o //
translated: A and li are joined.

original: si tsa la di sbyar /
analyzed: si tsa la di sbyar /
translated: Sita and la are joined.

original: gong du aa'o //
analyzed: gong du aa'o //
translated: A is above.

original: aa si tsata'o /
analyzed: aa si tsata'o /
translated: A and sita.

original: pu sh'a di dyu t'a dyli k'a r'a nu bandh'artisharti shasti bhyashtsa pa ra smee /
analyzed: pu sh'a di dyu t'a dyli k'a r'a nu bandh'artisharti shasti bhyashtsa pa ra smee /
translated: Puṣā, dī, dyuti, āyudha, anubandha, ṛti, ṣṭi, bhya, śca, param, smai.

original: pu sha ni rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: pu sha ni rgyas pa ste /
translated: Puṣa means to expand.

original: de la sogs pa rnams dang / dyu ta ni 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: de la sogs pa rnams dang / dyu ta ni 'bar ba ste /
translated: Those and so forth, and dyu means to shine,

original: de la sogs pa rnams dang de bzhin du li'i mtha' can gyi dh'a tu rnams dang / de bzhin du li ni 'gro ba dang ri sri yang 'gro ba'i don can no ;
analyzed: de la sogs pa rnams dang de bzhin du li'i mtha' can gyi dh'a tu rnams dang / de bzhin du li ni 'gro ba dang ri sri yang 'gro ba'i don can no ;
translated: those and so forth, and likewise, the dhātus that end in li, and likewise, li means to go, and ri and sri also have the meaning of to go.🔽 Śā means to teach.

original: / sh'a su ni rjes su ston pa ste /
analyzed: / sh'a su ni rjes su ston pa ste /
translated: The sha is the instruction.🔽🔽

original: de rnams dang pha rol ni byed pa po'i tshig la aadya ta n'i gzhan gyi tshig can yod na rkyen aan\ 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de rnams dang pha rol ni byed pa po'i tshig la aadya ta n'i gzhan gyi tshig can yod na rkyen aan\ 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: If there is a word for an agent and a word for another, the suffix ṇ will be added.

original: pu sha la sogs pa rnams ni /
analyzed: pu sha la sogs pa rnams ni /
translated: With puṣa and so on,

original: pu sha la di sbyar bas bar du aan\ 'byung ste /
analyzed: pu sha la di sbyar bas bar du aan\ 'byung ste /
translated: since puṣa is conjoined with ḍi, ṇ will be added in the middle.

original: sha dang sbyar gong du aa'o //
analyzed: sha dang sbyar gong du aa'o //
translated: Since it is conjoined with śa, ṇ is added above.

original: aa pu shata'o //
analyzed: aa pu shata'o //
translated: It becomes apuṣṭa.

original: tu sha la di la sogs pa gong bzhin /
analyzed: tu sha la di la sogs pa gong bzhin /
translated: With tuṣa and so on, as above.

original: aa tu sha ta'o //
analyzed: aa tu sha ta'o //
translated: It becomes atuṣṭa.

original: shu sha la yang gong bzhin /
analyzed: shu sha la yang gong bzhin /
translated: With śuṣa, as above.

original: aa shu shata'o //
analyzed: aa shu shata'o //
translated: It becomes aśuṣṭa.

original: pu sha ni rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: pu sha ni rgyas pa'o //
translated: Puṣa is to increase.

original: tusha ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: tusha ni dga' ba'o //
translated: Tuṣa is to delight.

original: shu sha ni skems pa'o //
analyzed: shu sha ni skems pa'o //
translated: Śuṣa is to dry up.

original: dyu ta la sogs pa rnams la /🔽dyu ta la di sbyar bas bar du aan\ sbyar /
analyzed: dyu ta la sogs pa rnams la / dyu ta la di sbyar bas bar du aan\ sbyar /
translated: With dyūta and so on,

original: gong du aa sbyar /
analyzed: gong du aa sbyar /
translated: since dyūta is conjoined with ḍi, ṇ is added in the middle.🔽Since it is conjoined with śa, ṇ is added above.

original: aa dyu ta ta\'o //
analyzed: aa dyu ta ta\'o //
translated: It becomes adyūta.

original: ru tsa la di sbyar ba gong bzhin /
analyzed: ru tsa la di sbyar ba gong bzhin /
translated: With ruca, as above.

original: aa ru tsan ta'o //
analyzed: aa ru tsan ta'o //
translated: It becomes arucanta.

original: dyu ta ni 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: dyu ta ni 'bar ba'o //
translated: Dyūta is to shine.

original: li rjes su 'brel pa rnams la /
analyzed: li rjes su 'brel pa rnams la /
translated: With li, which is connected,

original: gimla la di sbyar bas /🔽li phyi / bar du aan\/
analyzed: gimla la di sbyar bas / li phyi / bar du aan\/
translated: since gimla is conjoined with ḍi,🔽li is added in the middle,🔽ṇ is added above,

original: na phyi / gong du aa sbyar /
analyzed: na phyi / gong du aa sbyar /
translated: and a is added above.

original: aa ga mata\'o //
analyzed: aa ga mata\'o //
translated: agamat.

original: aa di la di sbyar bas /
analyzed: aa di la di sbyar bas /
translated: By joining adi to ladi,🔽ghasli is obtained.

original: ghisla thob / gong du aa sbyar /
analyzed: ghisla thob / gong du aa sbyar /
translated: By adding a above,

original: li phyi / aan dang sbyar /
analyzed: li phyi / aan dang sbyar /
translated: an is joined to li,

original: aa gha sata\'o //
analyzed: aa gha sata\'o //
translated: aghatso.

original: gam\ li ni 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: gam\ li ni 'gro ba'o //
translated: Ghamini means “going.”

original: @41a * // aa di'i gha sli gzhag pa ste //
analyzed: @41a * // aa di'i gha sli gzhag pa ste //
translated: The gha of adi is placed.

original: aarti sogs rnams la //
analyzed: aarti sogs rnams la //
translated: With arti and so on,🔽by joining di to ri, an is in the middle,

original: ri la di sbyar bas bar du aan\ gong du aa //
analyzed: ri la di sbyar bas bar du aan\ gong du aa //
translated: and a above.

original: ris aar\ thob /
analyzed: ris aar\ thob /
translated: Ri becomes ar.

original: aa gnyis / sa ma na d'irgha ra dang aan\ gyi aa sbyar a'a ra\ta'o //
analyzed: aa gnyis / sa ma na d'irgha ra dang aan\ gyi aa sbyar a'a ra\ta'o //
translated: By adding a twice to samandirghara and an, arat is obtained.

original: sri la gong ma bzhin /
analyzed: sri la gong ma bzhin /
translated: With sri, it is as above.

original: aa sa rata'o //
analyzed: aa sa rata'o //
translated: It becomes asarat.

original: sha sha la ki sbyar shas /
analyzed: sha sha la ki sbyar shas /
translated: By joining k to shasha, sh is obtained.

original: ai thob pa la sogs pa gong bzhin /
analyzed: ai thob pa la sogs pa gong bzhin /
translated: By adding i and so on as above,

original: aa shisha ta'o //🔽dri pi dang / tri pi dag la aan 'byung par gsungs pa'am /
analyzed: aa shisha ta'o // dri pi dang / tri pi dag la aan 'byung par gsungs pa'am /
translated: it becomes ashishat.🔽With drip and trip, it is said that an arises.

original: tri pa la di sbyar bas bar du aan\/
analyzed: tri pa la di sbyar bas bar du aan\/
translated: Or by joining di to trip, an is in the middle,

original: gong du aa'o //
analyzed: gong du aa'o //
translated: and a above.

original: aa tri pata'o //
analyzed: aa tri pata'o //
translated: It becomes atripat.

original: yang na tri pa la di sbyar bas bar du si tsa /
analyzed: yang na tri pa la di sbyar bas bar du si tsa /
translated: Or by joining di to trip, sitsa is in the middle,

original: gong du aing /
analyzed: gong du aing /
translated: iṅ is above,

original: 'og tu aing /
analyzed: 'og tu aing /
translated: iṅ is below,

original: si tsa phyi /
analyzed: si tsa phyi /
translated: sitsa is expelled,

original: sa ma na d'irgha'o //
analyzed: sa ma na d'irgha'o //
translated: and samandirghara is obtained.

original: tri pa la sogs pa gong bzhin /
analyzed: tri pa la sogs pa gong bzhin /
translated: With trip and so on, it is as above.

original: aa tri pata'o //
analyzed: aa tri pata'o //
translated: A-tri-pat.

analyzed: yang na dri la aa thob pa dang / ri rar byas pa la sogs pa gong bzhin // dri pa ni dga' ba'o //
translated: Or else, dri is a and pat is ri and so on as above.🔽 Dri is delight.

original: dri pa ni mgu ba'o //🔽ai rjes su 'brel pa rnams la aan\ 'byung bar gsung p'am /
analyzed: dri pa ni mgu ba'o // ai rjes su 'brel pa rnams la aan\ 'byung bar gsung p'am /
translated: Dri is pleasing.🔽  I is connection and an is arising, as stated.

original: bhi dir la aa dya ti n'i'i di sbyar /🔽gong du aa sbyar /
analyzed: bhi dir la aa dya ti n'i'i di sbyar / gong du aa sbyar /
translated: Or else, bhid is a and di is adya and so on.

original: air phyi // bar du aan sbyar ;
analyzed: air phyi // bar du aan sbyar ;

original: na phyi // sa dang sbyar bas /
analyzed: na phyi // sa dang sbyar bas /

original: sa bha di ta\'o //
analyzed: sa bha di ta\'o //

original: yang na si tsa sbyar /
analyzed: yang na si tsa sbyar /
translated: Or else, si is joined and ca is bhi and so on.

original: bhi bher 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: bhi bher 'phel ba'o //

original: ru dhir la di sbyar /🔽gong du aa sbyar /
analyzed: ru dhir la di sbyar / gong du aa sbyar /

original: air phyi nas /
analyzed: air phyi nas /
translated: I is outside and an is in between.

original: aan\ gyi aa dang dh'a sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: aan\ gyi aa dang dh'a sbyar ba'o //
translated: An is a and dha is joined.

original: aa ru nghat\'o / yang na si dang sbyar bas aid sbyar ba dang / ru roor 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: aa ru nghat\'o / yang na si dang sbyar bas aid sbyar ba dang / ru roor 'phel ba'o //
translated: A is ruha and so on. Or else, si is joined and ru is roha and so on.

original: ai dz'atme ne pa de pa tha me ka ba tsa ne //
analyzed: ai dz'atme ne pa de pa tha me ka ba tsa ne //
translated: I is jata and me is pad and so on.

original: pa dag doo zhes bya ba'i dh'a tu 'dil ai tsa 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: pa dag doo zhes bya ba'i dh'a tu 'dil ai tsa 'byung ba ste /

original: dh'a tu gang gi thog ma na dbyangs yod cing de tshig gnyis pa ma byas pa la gnyis pa'i tshig 'byung bar 'gyur pa zhes gsungs pa ste /

analyzed: da ri dr'a la aat sbyar bas da gnyis ba byas aat kyis aoo thob ste /

analyzed: mdo 'dis ai srings /

analyzed: yi ge aa zhes //
